infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FleetIA needs your location to track vehicle routes and provide location-based services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: FleetIA needs your location to track vehicle routes even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FleetIA needs camera access to take photos for vehicle inspections and issue reporting.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FleetIA needs photo library access to attach photos to inspections and reports.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: FleetIA needs Bluetooth access to track key fobs and vehicle access.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow FleetIA to use Face ID for secure authentication.
